resources.string:
Originally written in C++ as a very rough and incomplete command-line tic tac toe program, Later was copied over to android studios and changed to an android app.\n\n
The C++ version was first started in November - December of 2014. Today is almost 2 years later on October 2nd 2016. This Tic-Tac-Toe project has seen many improvements and changes and now I am finally at a point where i can soundly say this app is ready for public release, marked version 1.0.
